Contact

Pricing listed is based off of traditional cake flavors with basic buttercream frosting and simple decorations unless otherwise noted. Certain flavors, fillings and decoration options may be subject to additional charges. Please contact us for specific pricing.

Wedding/Tiered Cakes *

Prices for cakes iced and decorated with buttercream frosting start at $5.50 per serving. Prices for cakes iced and decorated with fondant start at $7 per serving.

Party Cakes

Sizes Servings Traditional Favor Price
6" 8-12 $35.00
8" 15-25 $55.00
10" 30-40 $82.00
12" 50-60 $110.00
14" 70-80 $155.00

See Flavors page for a list of traditional and Signature flavors. Custom flavors and fillings are available. Additional charges apply.

Smash Cakes

1st birthday cakes come with a complimentary smash cake for the child. Must mention smash cake when ordering.

Cupcakes*

All cupcakes are available by the dozen

Traditional Flavor: $35.00
Signature flavor and Fillings available. Additional charges may apply.

Mini Cupcakes

Traditional Flavor: $15.00 (2 dozen minimum order required)

Cake Pucks

Traditional Flavor $35 per dozen
Filled/Signature Flavor $40+ per dozen
Contact us for more information

Cake Pops

Traditional Flavor
Custom Decorated

Cake Pops come packaged together in a box. Individual packaging available for an additional $5 a dozen.

Delivery

There is a $5.00 minimum charge for all products delivered. See map below for approximate delivery fees. Pricing subject to change depending on traffic times and current gas prices.

*Prices may vary. Prices listed include basic buttercream frosting and filling. There may be extra charges for variations or ingredients. All pricing is subject to degree of difficulty and supplies needed. Please contact us for more specific information.
